summary: Indian Wars is the name generally used in the United States to describe a series of conflicts between the colonial or federal government and the native people of North America.
full_text:
Plains is a town in and the county seat of Yoakum County, Texas, United States. The population was 1,481 at the 2010 census.
^ "American FactFinder". United States Census Bureau. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "US Board on Geographic Names". United States Geological Survey. 2007-10-25. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "Find a County". National Association of Counties. Retrieved 2011-06-07.
title: Plains, Texas
